question: Who has been appointed as the new editor-in-chief of the television channel Rajya Sabha TV?
explanation: Television journalist Rahul Mahajan has been appointed as the new editor-in-chief of the television channel Rajya Sabha TV. He is currently a consulting editor in Prasar Bharati. Mahajan has been a journalist for 26 years, starting off with Hindi daily \'Jansatta\'. He later branched out to television news. He worked with leading Hindi television channels such as Aaj Tak, Zee News and Star News.
